text:
@YNB @TiffanyDCross @amjoyshow @TiffanyDCross, thank you for keeping @Bruce_LeVell on task. How does the person in charge of diversity call COVID-19 a Chinese virus? Seeing a Black man respond to voter suppression & COVID-19 the way he did was telling.

p.s. Bruce, Sessions & Cotton blocked First Step in 2015.
